change.	Many	women	find	that

for help and support. But your

You	may	find	that	she	is	trying	
to take over or that she is so 
anxious not to interfere that 
she doesnâ€™t help at all. Try to 
let her and others know what

Your relationship with your 
partner will also change. It is 
very easy in those exhausting 
early weeks just to leave things
